title: I really wanted the new Fiora to be good.

replies.body: Umm.. Fiora was already too OP. She was a massive lane bully, had a BS ultimate that did so much damage AND made her untargetable, and now she has a better W and R (in teamfights).
Why not get tri-force? (my answer to every unbalanced champion)
Her laning is really oppressive and if she gets ahead she can zone you out of farm with her passive.

You are joking right? She has shredded me every game I've versed her. She needs to be nerfed asap! That heal after her ult, not only is it out of character, but it is also op. I versed a Fiora, got her to 15hp, then she ulted and in a couple of seconds, she was back to full health.

> [{quoted}](name=The Spawn Man,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2Gn4XANx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-08T14:57:02.034+0000)
>
> You are joking right? She has shredded me every game I've versed her. She needs to be nerfed asap! That heal after her ult, not only is it out of character, but it is also op. I versed a Fiora, got her to 15hp, then she ulted and in a couple of seconds, she was back to full health.

Just like old Fiora ulting, only this time you can actually get her out of it. She's harder to play if you are familiar with the old Fiora.

Had her in ARAM very terrible. You won't be able to walk up to like a single person as there are 4 people backing them up from gettign attacked by you. Trying to attack their weak spot shown by your passive isn't even going to be easy as I said before 4 people backing the person you want to go for. THEN again this is ARAM she's terrible in ARAM, in Normals I'd find that she's not all that good. How? Shred a Fiora as Nasus with her new Change.
